00044         // The SystemManager class is the root object of the omegalib architecture.
00045         class OMEGA_API SystemManager
00046         {
00047         public:
00048                 // Get the singleton instance of the system manager.
00049                 static SystemManager* instance();
00050 
00052                 void setup(Config* cfg);
00053 
00054                 void initialize();
00055 
00058                 void    run();
00059 
00061                 void postExitRequest(const String& reason = "Undefined reason");
00062 
00064                 void cleanup();
00065

00068

00073

00093

00095                 SystemManager();
00096                 ~SystemManager();
00097 
00098                 void setupServiceManager();
00099                 void setupDisplaySystem();
00100 
00101         private:

00103                 static SystemManager* mysInstance;
00104
